signals.reason: RSI is below 30 indicating oversold, MACD histogram is negative and the MACD line is crossing below the signal line, price is trading below EMA9 and EMA21, Bollinger Bands show price near the lower band, Stochastic is below 20 and turning down, recent 1‑minute candles have more down closes than up, confirming a short‑term downtrend.

MACD histogram turned negative and the MACD line crossed below its signal line. RSI is around 42, sliding below 50, indicating weakening momentum. Bollinger Bands have the price touching the lower band. Stochastic %K is below %D and under 20, confirming oversold down pressure. All indicators point to a short‑term down move with high confidence.
